h1_title: Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough
content: When you appear in this new area, you'll find it's much larger than the other secret areas in previous chapter, hiding not one, not two -- but three bosses. Two of these can be missed and made unavailable if you beeline to the final boss, so fair warning!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_4_Secret-Purple_Cloud_Mountain_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Purple Cloud Mountain'.
The content is as follows:
When you appear in this new area, you'll find it's much larger than the other secret areas in previous chapter, hiding not one, not two -- but three bosses. Two of these can be missed and made unavailable if you beeline to the final boss, so fair warning!
